## ğŸ“¦ Unified Artifact Structure

```
unified-test-report-{run_number}.zip (~500KB)
â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“Š ctrf-report.json (50KB)
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ CTRF standard format (300+ AI models compatible)
â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ ai-ready-summary.md (15KB)
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ Human-readable test overview
â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ” failed-tests-detailed.json (30KB)
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ Structured error data + suggested fixes
â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ˆ metrics.json (10KB)
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ Performance metrics + job durations
â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“„ metadata.json (5KB)
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ Build context + environment info
â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ¤– ai-analysis.json (20KB) [optional]
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ AI-generated insights (requires API key)
â””â”€â”€ ğŸ“‹ logs/ (370KB)
    â”œâ”€â”€ validate-compose.log
    â”œâ”€â”€ build-n8n.log
    â”œâ”€â”€ trivy-scan.log
    â””â”€â”€ ... (Ğ²ÑĞµ 15 job logs + Docker logs)
```

## ğŸ¤– AI Integration

### ĞŸĞ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ĞµĞ¼Ñ‹Ğµ AI Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ğ¸

| AI Model | Free Tier | API Key Required | CTRF Support |
|----------|-----------|------------------|---------------|
| **Claude** (Anthropic) | âœ… Yes | âŒ No | âœ… Native |
| **ChatGPT** (OpenAI) | âœ… Yes | âŒ No | âœ… Native |
| **Gemini** (Google) | âœ… Yes | âŒ No | âœ… Native |
| **300+ other models** | Varies | Varies | âœ… CTRF Standard |

### Quick AI Usage

```bash
# 1. Download artifact
gh run download $RUN_ID --name unified-test-report-*

# 2. Extract
unzip unified-test-report-*.zip

# 3. Upload to AI:
# - ctrf-report.json
# - failed-tests-detailed.json
# - metadata.json

# 4. Prompt:
# "Analyze these test results and identify root causes with priority fixes"
```

**Ğ ĞµĞ·ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚:**
- âœ… Root cause analysis
- âœ… Cascading failure detection
- âœ… Priority-ordered fixes
- âœ… Specific code changes

## ğŸ”— External Resources

### CTRF Standard
- **Specification:** https://ctrf.io/docs/intro
- **GitHub:** https://github.com/ctrf-io
- **Validator:** `npm install -g @ctrf/cli`

### GitHub Actions
- **Artifacts Guide:** https://docs.github.com/en/actions/using-workflows/storing-workflow-data-as-artifacts
- **YAML Syntax:** https://docs.github.com/en/actions/using-workflows/workflow-syntax-for-github-actions

### AI Platforms
- **Claude:** https://claude.ai (Free)
- **ChatGPT:** https://chat.openai.com (Free)
- **Gemini:** https://gemini.google.com (Free)
